wikipedia_page.main: Victoria Studd is a British television presenter.

response: Edward married former Wish You Were Here? presenter Victoria Studd.
****Edward Bonham Carter (b. 24 May 1960), banker; married Victoria Studd with issue 2 sons and 1 daughter.
